conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! Here's how to store leftover biryani and reduce food waste:

• Store leftover biryani in an airtight container in the refrigerator. It can last for 2-3 days.

• Another option is to freeze the biryani in a freezer-safe container. It can last for up to 1 month.

• You can transform leftover biryani into biryani cutlets. Mix the biryani with mashed potatoes, shape them into cutlets, and pan-fry them (estimated cost: 40 BDT).

Reducing food waste helps lower greenhouse gas emissions in Bangladesh.

Next step: Refrigerate or freeze your biryani as soon as possible to prevent spoilage.
